General.Name: Sumo Resources PLC
General.Description: Sumo Resources Plc, through its subsidiaries, engages in mining and trading minerals primarily in Africa. It focuses on the extraction and trade of rare minerals, such as tantalum, niobium, gold, and diamonds. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 34 Landguard Road, London, United Kingdom, SO15 5DP
